This episode also looks at recent missions, including the Herschel Space Observatory's examination of the Milky Wa

programme.title: The Ever Expanding Universe

programme.title: THE NEXT BIG LEAPS
programme.desc: The New Frontier: THE NEXT BIG LEAPS, S05E10, Projects in the works. SunRISE, SPHEREx, NEOS and others, their mission to expand our knowledge of Earth, the surrounding space, Dark Matter, and the earliest galaxies. N

programme.title: Return To The Moon
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Return To The Moon, S01E02, The Moon, our closest celestial companion. Our indispensible dance partner through the cosmos.

programme.title: Exo Planeta
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Exo Planeta, S01E09, As scientists and astronomers peer closer at nearby stars with ever more fidelity they are discovering planets; exo planets, worlds outside our own solar system.

programme.title: INCREASING ORBIT
programme.desc: The New Frontier: INCREASING ORBIT, S05E05, The ISS is the workhorse of the international spacefaring community, but its days are numbered. R

programme.title: The Planet Makers
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Planet Makers, S01E05, From the beginnings of our Solar System four and half billion years ago there remains tantalizing clues to its evolution; remnent debris: asteroids and comets.

programme.title: The Moons of Olympis
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Moons of Olympis, S01E07, These are the the Moon's of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic.

programme.title: WEBB OF LIFE
programme.desc: The New Frontier: WEBB OF LIFE, S05E08, The James Webb Space Telescope is now operational. Launched aboard an Arianne 5 the 10-billion-dollar spacecraft has deployed successfully and reached its orbit around the Sun.

programme.title: Stars Above
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Stars Above, S02E09, Stars are a bit like human beings. They can be warm or cold, they come in all kinds of shapes and sizes.

programme.title: The Inner Worlds
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Inner Worlds, S01E03, They orbit between us and our Star, the inner worlds; hidden within the sun's glare often only visible at sunrise or sunset.

programme.title: The Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Sun, S01E08, It powers the machinery of nature; our weather, encourages and sustains life on land and at sea.

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.

programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E04, Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E06, Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.

programme.title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E07, The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.

programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E08, Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E10, To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E11, The Beginning of the End - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. Apollo Gets Complicated - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: The Shuttle Program, The Challenger Disaster & Return to Space
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E12, The Shuttle Program - The first re-useable spacecraft. The Challenger Disaster - Pressing launch schedules lead to carelessness and the loss of the Challenger. Return to Space - A re-designed shuttle is back in space with a redefined role.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle Matures, Complex Space Construction & The Final Years of the Space Shuttle
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E13, The Space Shuttle Matures - The Space Transportation System changes the nature of orbital missions. Complex Construction in Space - Confidence in the shuttle begins to return and engineers for get the lessons of the past.

programme.title: Fresh Eyes
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Fresh Eyes, S04E06, Two new space telescopes are in orbit and completing their shakedown; Gaia and TESS they too will be joined by the James Webb Telescope.
MOON SHINE, S05E02, The International drive to return to the Moon is gathering pace, this multi- nation effort is readying to return, stay and utilise the Lunar assets.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E01, In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: One Tough Mother
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E18, In July 1997, the brutal murder of 19-year-old Tiffany Johnston rocks the small town of Bethany, Oklahoma. DNA points to her killer over a decade later and leads investigators across state lines.

programme.title: Killer in the Storm
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E01, In the heart of Cajun country, young mother Brenda DuPont is found murdered in her home in May 1988. The initial investigation sputters and turns cold, but her sister Linda vows to solve her murder.

programme.title: Woman in the Woods
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E12, In August 1972, the body of Jody Loomis is found in the woods. 34 years later, the killer's DNA is recovered from Jody's old clothing but it isn't matched until 2018.

programme.title: Sisters In Death
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E17, March 1984. Jack Kennedy discovers his daughters brutally murdered. Their mother and niece spend their lives keeping the case alive. DNA leads nowhere. 30 years later, an informant gives up a name.

programme.title: Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E3005, A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Dark Angel
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E14, 13 days after Pam Pitts disappears in 1988 her charred body is found at a popular hangout spot in the Arizona desert. When a second victim is discovered in a mineshaft, detectives suspect the killer may have known them both.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: The Heartland Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E05, In the 1980s, a suspected serial killer preyed on women in small towns located on the banks of the Mississippi River until the murders abruptly ceased and went unsolved.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E07, A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E23, The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E27, In early 1984, three-year-old Vanessa Bennett becomes the lone survivor of her family's brutal murder. Initial investigators suspect a serial killer is at large, but decades pass before DNA narrows the suspect pool to one man.

programme.title: Bump In The Night/Hitchhike To Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E24, A woman who takes down the license plate number of a car that had been following her helps police solve the murder of another young woman.

programme.title: Suspicious Minds
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E10, In 1984, a 15-year-old girl is found murdered in her grandparents' home. For decades, a stalled investigation only fuels the town rumor mill, pointing an accusing finger at her 13-year-old sister.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Barugon, 19910622000000 +0000, The Mads send the crew another Gamera movie. This time, a group of travelers scour the jungle in search of a giant opal. What they find is actually the egg of a lizard-dog creature called Barugon.

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Gaos, 19910727000000 +0000, Gamera is back and this time he is up against Gaos, a bat-monster with the ability to shoot laser beams. Joel and the Bots make an arts and crafts project.
MST3K: Gamera Vs. Guiron, 19910907000000 +0000, It's Gamera Movie #4, including the Gamera Theme Song and a reenactment of an old favorite magic trick.
MST3K: Gamera vs. Jiger, 20220722000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch Gamera save the day at Osaka's Expo '70, in GAMERA VS JIGER (1970). Pearl tries to convince Kinga to take a break.

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Zigra, 19911019000000 +0000, The seventh offering from Gamera: the infamous turtle faces off against an alien called Zigra determined on world domination. Joel and the Bots build a scale model of Gamera and make shoebox dioramas.
MST3K: Pod People, 19910615000000 +0000, A child adopts a large egg which hatches into a mischievous alien, while a group of pop musicians on a wilderness vacation runs into trouble.

programme.title: Mitchell
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Mitchell, S05E12, The trio sit through a dreary Joe Don Baker disasterpiece as Gypsy tries to find a way to save Joel from being killed by the Mads.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Undersea Kingdom - Chapter 2: The Undersea City
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E15, The second installment of the undersea adventure to Atlantis.

programme.title: Werewolf
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Werewolf, S05E28, After digging up strange bones, a man becomes a werewolf.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: A Date With Your Family
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E19, Learn the many ways you've acted improperly during family dinners in this 1950s short.

programme.title: Overdrawn At The Memory Bank
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Overdrawn At The Memory Bank, S09E22, A weather tech's mind gets trapped in a computer and Pearl establishes her own public television pledge program.

Recipe for Love, 20141011000000 +0000, A culinary-school hopeful gets assigned to ghostwrite a cookbook for a popular celebrity chef, but the two of them clash over contradictory cooking styles. However, their shared love of cooking sparks a connection.

Remember Sunday, 20130421000000 +0000, A down-on-her-luck waitress meets jewelry store clerk, Gus, but complications ensue because of his memory problems. A brain aneurysm three years earlier gives Gus a blank slate the second his alarm wakes him each day.
When Calls the Heart, 20130101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Maggie Grace stars as Elizabeth Thatcher, a cultured young teacher in 1910.

programme.title: The Grey-cation
programme.desc: Good Witch, S05E07, Hallmark Original Series. Martha and Tom stay at Grey House.

programme.title: The Treasure
programme.desc: Good Witch, S05E08, Hallmark Original Series. It's Founder's Day in Middleton.

programme.title: The Comet
programme.desc: Good Witch, S05E09, Hallmark Original Series. Middleton is abuzz with the arrival of a comet that appears every hundred years.

programme.title: The Graduation
programme.desc: Good Witch, S05E10, Hallmark Original Series. Grace and Nick's graduation day has arrived.

programme.title: The Anniversary
programme.desc: Good Witch, S06E01, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie and Sam celebrate their first wedding anniversary.

programme.title: The Chili
programme.desc: Good Witch, S06E02, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie and Joy discover a time capsule that Grace buried years ago.

programme.title: The Clock
programme.desc: Good Witch, S06E03, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie, Abigail and Joy browse an estate sale.

programme.title: The Dinner
programme.desc: Good Witch, S06E04, Hallmark Original Series. Martha receives a mysterious letter before a Middleton progressive dinner.

programme.title: The Mandala
programme.desc: Good Witch, S06E05, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie pursues a temporary art history professorship while Sam diagnoses Adam.
The Good Witch's Family, 20080101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Cassie Nightingale and her family receive a visit from a mysterious woman.

Sandra Brown's White Hot, 20160417000000 +0000, After her younger brother Danny dies, Sayre Hoyle breaks her vow to never return home. But when police discover that Danny's death was a homicide, Sayre is forced to confront her father along with a powder keg of old hatreds.

programme.title: Hope
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E14, While connected to the stones in an attempt to contact Homeworld Command, Chloe wakes up with Ginns consciousness. Eli must find a way to protect Chloe without losing Ginn. Meanwhile, Volker requires a difficult operation to save his life.

programme.title: Seizure
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E15, Homeworld Command tries to convince an ally they suspect might be infiltrated by the Lucian Alliance to let them use their planet to power up and dial Destiny. Meanwhile, Rush is trapped in a simulation created by Amanda Perry.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E16, While exploring a planet, the team is attacked and members are taken captive by an alien creature. The team must turn to Varro and his Lucian team for help. Meanwhile, on Destiny, Eli and Brody mistakenly trap Brody in a cryogenic device.

programme.title: Icon
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E05, On a distant planet the Stargate has become a symbol to the people, and some believe that the gods will return through it to reward the faithful. SG-1 realizes that those gods are the Goa'uld and warn of the danger they may face.

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E06, The team agrees that an easy VR simulator is a useless training tool against the Goa'uld. Teal'c lets it learn from him, but as he plays, the game sends a shock each time he dies, and if he doesn't defeat the game, the chair will kill him.

programme.title: Affinity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E07, Teal'c, having finally been cleared to live off-base, settles into his new neighborhood. His neighbors love him. He's quiet and he has become a sort of protector of his community but not everybody is as pleased about Teal'c's civilian assimilation.

programme.title: Covenant
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E08, Alec Colson is claiming he has shocking proof that the government is covering up a liaison with aliens, and that Earth was almost destroyed by an alien invasion, Colson gives all nations involved 24 hours to come clean or he'll do it for them.

programme.title: Sacrifices
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E09, Teal'c and Bra'tac have just returned from the planet Ha'ktyl, where they tried to convince the warrior-woman rebel leader Ishta, to wait until her fellow insurgent Jaffa grow numerous enough to wage war against all the Goa'uld system lords at once.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E10, The Stargate is missing. Upon investigation the team notice a scientist tagging the stargate with a locator beacon. It looks like this is the work of The Trust taking whatever ruthless action they deem necessary to protect Earth from alien invaders.

programme.title: Gemini
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E11, An old IDC comes through; Send M.A.L.P. The M.A.L.P. telemetry shows that the person sending the transmission is Carter but Carter is in the control room at SGC. The Carter on the other side explains that she is a Replicator.

programme.title: Prometheus Unbound
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E12, A mission has been greenlit to take the Prometheus to the Pegasus galaxy. Jackson wants in. O'Neill feels he is too valuable to risk. The decision is overridden by the mission commander, none other than Gen. Hammond, now head of home world security.

programme.title: It's Good To Be King
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E13, Hoping to warn Harry Maybourne of Goa'uld attacks, SG-1 arrives at his last known whereabouts to find that he has been appointed king of a primitive people and believes he possesses writings by a time-traveling Ancient predicting these events.

programme.title: Full Alert
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E14, When O'Neill finds the door to his home forced open and former Vice President Kinsey waiting for him inside, his first instinct is to call the police. But he allies himself with Kinsey when he learns of a rogue organization known as The Trust.

programme.title: Citizen Joe
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E15, At a tag sale, civilian Joe Spencer comes across a small stone that gives him visions of SG-1 in action. Delighted, he shares the stories with anyone who will listen. But when he learns that SG-1 really exists, his excitement turns into obsession.

programme.title: Reckoning (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E16, Teal'c and Bra'tac believe the time is right to lead their people in an uprising against the Goa'uld. Their plan suffers a setback when an army of Replicators begins to systematically take control of Goa'uld ships and Jackson is taken prisoner.

programme.title: Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E01, As Sheppard and Ronon are trapped beneath a collapsed compound, McKay and Lorne are trapped in another pocket of debris. Michaels flagship Wraith Cruiser hurtles towards the compound, while Carter leads a rescue mission. Who will reach them first?

programme.title: The Seed
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E02, When Dr. Keller fails to report for her shift, concerned team members are shocked to discover her unconscious in her quarters. With the situation on Atlantis escalating, Woolsey is ultimately faced with a decision that could cost Keller her life.

programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E026, David leads Brenda, Kelly, and Donna to the Bel Age Hotel on a mission to meet the pop group 'Color Me Badd' when they come to town.

programme.title: Wedding Bell Blues
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E028, When the Taylor house suddenly floods from a ruptured water pipe, the Walshes reluctantly agree to host Mel and Jackie's wedding at theirs.

programme.title: Misery Loves Company
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E001, Summer vacation begins and Brenda starts lying to her parents to see Dylan. Brandon starts his summer job at the Beach Club.

programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E002, The Walsh's become upset over Brenda's relationship with Dylan, and Steve gets himself into a jam with twins.

programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E003, Brenda and Donna arrive in Paris while Dylan struggles with his father's plan to gain parole from prison.

programme.title: Sex, Lies and Volleyball / Photo Fini
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E004, While Donna works as a model in Paris, David wonders whether his heart belongs to Donna.

programme.title: Shooting Star / American in Paris

programme.title: Castles in the Sand

programme.title: A Song of Myself

programme.title: The Back Story

programme.title: Highwire

programme.title: Home and Away

programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E011, Sue Scanlon accuses Gil Meyers of sexual misconduct, which leads to his suspension. Andrea offers her support to the misguided teen and finds that there's more to the story than Sue is telling.

programme.title: Wild Horses

programme.title: Plowed Under/CPR Baby

programme.title: Seattle Cop, Part 2/Digitalis Kid OD

programme.title: Chance of a Lifetime
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E13, Stephanie and Tom go on their honeymoon in a two-mast schooner with a group of troubled teenagers, with Mitch and Neely along for help. All is going well until they get trapped in a hurricane and the ship starts sinking!

programme.title: Talk Show
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E14, Mitch gets his 15 minutes of fame when he rescues Jay Leno from choking, and a female talk show host from drowning. Caroline and CJ adopt a stray dog swimming in the ocean that mystically reminds them of Stephanie.

programme.title: Life Guardian
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E15, After Caroline, Neely and Manny rescue three orphan teenage boys from drowning, Caroline seeks out the enigmatic, mysterious youth who helped her rescue one of the boys. Neely's ex-husband returns, complicating her life.

programme.title: Matters of the Heart
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E16, Manny is haunted by his past when two juvenile delinquents from his home borough in East LA arrive at Baywatch for community service. Meanwhile, Neely suspects Mitch and Samantha are becoming more than coworkers.

programme.title: Rendezvous
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E17, When a young couples romance is threatened by their parents, they make a pact to end their lives together rather than end their romance. Meanwhile, Cody encounters a mermaid while diving, and of course no one believes him except CJ.

programme.title: Hot Water
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E18, While testing new scuba diving technology, Sam, Neely and Caroline witness a jet crash. They rescue the pilot, who reveals that he was transporting a canister that contains a deadly virus. Meanwhile, the team must shut down an illegal nude beach.

programme.title: Baywatch at Sea World
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E19, Caroline finds herself being sued for negligence in civil court by the angry and bitter mother of a drowning victim. CJ babysits a neighbors newborn and realizes she wants to be a mother. But is Cody ready to be a father?

programme.title: Trial by Fire
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E20, CJ and Cody transport an injured sea lion to the animal recovery facility at Sea World. While there, Samantha gets the idea to promote lifeguarding by planning a Baywatch-theme stunt show at Sea World.

programme.title: Golden Girls
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E21, A crazed young woman is causing trouble on the Venice Boardwalk and Neely suspects it is more than meets the eye. Meanwhile, Newman meets his dream woman who doesnt speak English.

programme.title: Nevermore
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E22, A mysterious, disfigured man whom the public dubs "the phantom lifeguard," is secretly saving people and sending love notes to CJ. When CJ goes missing the team sets out to find her and the phantom.

programme.title: Rookie Summer
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E01, Young, ambitious and sexy lifeguard candidates compete for a chance to attend Rookie School. Mitch is offered a promotion to Captain and has a tough decision to make. Lani McKensie faces the sinister return of a former lover.

programme.title: Next Generation
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E02, Hobie, Lani, April, and Skylar are among the trainees competing for a few open slots as Baywatch Lifeguards. Hobie isn't sure he wants to follow in his father's footsteps, but when a vengeful jet skier comes after April, Hobie comes to her rescue.

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E03, Veteran lifeguard Jack 'JD' Darius has a dark secret in his past. He comes to Baywatch to throw his rescue can in the ring for the open Lieutenant slot, but young and ambitious Taylor Walsh also wants the job, and she's ready to fight for it.

programme.title: Memorial Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E04, Mitch, Sky, and April find a dead man on the ocean floor. Their search for answers to his demise leads to the retirement home where he lived, and his two friends who seem to be hiding the true story. The chemistry between Cody and Lani heats up.

programme.title: Charlie
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E05, April is devastated by her younger brother Charlies terminal illness. Mitch and Hobie want to make sure Charlie's wishes are granted, and that the time he spends with the lifeguards at Baywatch is the best of his life.

programme.title: Lifeguard Confidential
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E06, Caroline's acting career isn't going well so she returns to Baywatch to figure out what she really wants to do with her life. The lifeguards are plagued by a sleaze-ball helicopter reporter who somehow knows intimate details about their love lives.

programme.title: Out of the Blue
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E07, After the devastation of the last big L.A. earthquake, Baywatch lifeguards are taking recent Seismic activity seriously. Caroline and JD 's tempestuous relationship heats up, forcing Caroline to make a critical decision that could change her life.
